word: Not to Be Casually Read.--It is not safe for us to turn from the Holy Scriptures with only a casual reading of their sacred pages. . . . Rein the mind up to the high task that has been set before it, and study with determined  interest, that you may understand divine truth. Those who do this will be surprised to find to what the mind can attain.--YI, June 29, 1893. (HC 35.)
